pageContext.claim: “And they went through and put my son, in particular, over a 15-minute meeting with somebody from Russia who met with everybody in Congress over the years. Everybody knew that it was a meeting about something totally different and it -- Don, Jr. went. And it's so unfair what they have done is -- what they've done to this country.”
pageContext.analysis: Ethics lawyers and campaign veterans say the sort of encounter between Donald Trump Jr. and the Russian attorney at the Trump Tower is highly unusual.
